name: Monero (XMR)
notes: Monero uses RingCT and stealth addresses for enhanced privacy.
tokenomicsNotes: Monero has a tail emission to ensure a minimum block reward for miners.

name: Zcash (ZEC)
notes: Zcash offers optional privacy using zk-SNARKs for shielded transactions.
tokenomicsNotes: Zcash follows a Bitcoin-like halving schedule.

name: Zano (ZANO)
notes: Zano offers privacy-preserving smart contracts and high scalability.
tokenomicsNotes: All transaction fees in Zano are burned, with tail emissions to maintain network security.
